description:
25 Banksia Rd, Bells Bridge, is a productive lifestyle property with healthy dam, established fruit trees, and “neat as a pin”, well-maintained and immaculately presented infrastructure!
Suitable for buyers moving from the hustle and bustle of busier cities or town centres, wanting to enjoy a hobby farming, self-sufficient lifestyle options, with room for the family!
Suitable for all hobby scale livestock pursuits, it currently homes a dozen sheep.
Situated in a quiet cul-de-sac, the property is only a minute away from Brooyar State Forest 1, offering scenic 4x4 trails, Glastonbury Creek Campground, and lookouts with abseiling and rock climbing, such as Point Pure, and Eagles Nest.

Property features:

* A near flat, fully dog proof fenced, useable 10 acres (4.05Ha) with a healthy dam, perfect for providing water to gardens, livestock, and crops.
* Solid, neat as a pin, clean and tidy, well maintained and presented brick veneer home with 4 bedrooms, a 2-way bathroom, large open plan living, kitchen, and dining area, laundry room, tiled roof, and full-length undercover back patio.
* Elevated block on top of small ridgeline, flood free, northerly aspect, perfectly sheltered from storms, enjoy morning sunshine and afternoon breezes.
* A mix of cleared paddocks with native and improved pastures, and some natural bush, with a healthy dam towards the rear boundary.
* Currently running 12 head of sheep but suitable for all livestock pursuits.
* Storage is provided with a single bay, steel framed Colourbond shed and workshop, as well as an extra car port the full length of the shed and plenty of room for extra off-street parking.
* Easy access via steel gates to paddocks, with flat usable yard space, perfect for future shed builds or a pool build if required.
* The home is in a well-maintained, and in great condition, with 4 large bedrooms, all with built in wardrobes and ceiling fans.
* The large open plan lounge and dining areas allow flow from front to back and are reverse cycle air conditioned, via a large unit, cooling or heating the whole home easily.
* The living areas also capture breezes, natural light, and have ceiling fans.
* A two-way bathroom can be closed off and used exclusively by the master bedroom and features a corner shower, vanity, heat lighting with exhaust fan, bath with hob, and separate WC.
* Ceiling fans, laminate floor coverings, tiled wet areas, carpeted bedrooms, blinds, flyscreens, security screens, and security doors feature throughout.
* The modern kitchen features; laminate benchtops, cupboards, drawers, overhead cabinetry and display shelving, breakfast bar, pantry, electric cooktop, rangehood and oven, and tiled splash backs.
* Separate laundry room with access to patio, yard, and clothesline, featuring a storage cupboard, wash tub/basin, and plenty of room for washing machine and dryer.
* A full length, Pebblecrete, undercover rear patio provides the outdoor entertaining options overlooking the private gardens, paddocks, and yard.
* Land line and NBN connection ready.
* Rainwater storage is captured from all roof space into two 5,500-gallon poly tanks.
* Park like, manicured house yard with established lawns, gardens, raised vegetable beds, fruit trees and shade trees.
* Great small animal shelter, solidly built with easy gated entry.
* Extra garden shed and small holding pond.
* A large 6.6KW solar system feeds back to the grid with 24 panels, taking care of most electricity needs.

If a quiet change of pace and lifestyle with self-sufficient capabilities, just beside a state forest access, and only 10-15 minutes from everything the Gympie township has to offer sounds like what you’re after, then you best inspect, quickly!

25 Banksia Road, Bells Bridge is located approximately: 1 hour and 20 minutes from Hervey Bay, 40 minutes from Maryborough, and is centrally located within 1 hour of Tin Can Bay, Rainbow Beach, Noosa Heads, the Sunshine Coast, and only 2 hours and 30 minutes to Brisbane CBD.

The owners are relocating and are committed to sell! All genuine offers will be presented!
Don’t delay contact marketing agent John McEwan on 0413 198 385 today!
